header.label: CORPORATE
header.intro: Our quality approach focused on customer satisfaction and continuous improvement.

policyItems: As Emof Teknoloji, to ensure continuous improvement with an innovative service approach that is fast, high quality, and closely follows technology in its sector,

To analyze our customers' expectations and requirements well, to provide the most effective and creative solutions to these expectations and requirements, cost-effectively, on time and quickly, ensuring customer satisfaction and trust,
To comply with legal regulations and statutory requirements,
To ensure the continuous development of all our employees with the help of necessary information and training, and to ensure that they achieve their unit and organizational goals,

To ensure that our quality management system is documented to fulfill the requirements of the ISO 9001 standard, that its risks and opportunities are determined, kept up-to-date, and continuously improved
